text: The Youth Parliament is a youth organisation in India. Formed to develop skill and awareness among the youth. Members meet regularly to hold debates and plan campaigns. ==History== Youth Parliament was launched in 2008 at Delhi. Annual Youth Parliament competitions are organized nationally. ==Related pages== *Youth in Action ==References== ==Other websites== * Youth Parliament, Official Website * Social Media links: ** Category:Youth organizations Category:2008 establishments in India Category:Organizations based in India
title: Youth Parliament
